name: Rose Dust Blood Ruins
description:
Rose Dust Blood Ruins...

or any other name this game chooses to call itself. It's name is randomly generated, so is the story. Different every time you play, always kinda bad... oh well.

Use mouse to look, WASD to walk around. Collect all the rubies to win (I'm not sure if that can be done at all, so... try it! ;) )
